item.description:
Hello Donna,

My name is Benny Migliorino from Popular Photography and American Photo Magazine. The reason for my e-mail to you is to inform you that our Digital Days workshop will be coming threw your area this weekend.

Digital Days is a hands on photo workshop series that travels around the country to 18 cities per year, unraveling the mysteries of digital imaging. After attending a session with our instructors you will come away with the knowledge, tools and confidence to be a better photographer and make digital photography work for you. Our curriculum is geared for people of varying skill-levels and with all kinds of equipment.

I would like to offer all WAP members to join us at no charge at all this normally cost $250.

I attached a PDF for with the FREE PROMO CODE to us when you sign up at www.DigitalDaysPhoto.com as well as the agenda for the weekend.

 

Use Promo Code  POP100 at Check out.

Sign up for Both Days, Either Day, or any session for FREE!!


You can get a better idea of the event from the video below.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z2g4kbdE-KU


Please feel free to call me with any question.


--------------------------------------

Benny Migliorino Digital Days Manager

212-779-5362

www.DigitalDaysPhoto.com

See the Itinerary: http://www.digitaldaysphoto.com/locations/boston-0

 

 

 

SATURDAY, JUNE 9
Digital Fundamentals
9:00 – 9:20   Welcome and Introduction
Camera setup and Care
9:20 – 11:00   Exposure
Taking control 
Special Camera features
Resolution and Media
11:00 – 11:15   Break
11:15 – 12:15   Choosing the right lens
Workflow
12:15 – 1:15   Lunch (on your own)
Expanding the Fundamentals
1:15 – 2:15  Keys to better photos, workflow 
and lighting
Advanced flash techniques 
Lighting Demo
2:15 – 2:30 Break
2:30 – 3:30  What’s wrong with this picture?
Photo Editing with Photoshop
Elements
3:30 – 4:15 Video Basics
4:15 – 5:00  The Story Behind the Photo
Q&A and Surveys

 

SUNDAY, JUNE 10
Intermediate Hands on Photo
9:00 – 10:15   Basic overview of exposure, WB, 
6 keys to better photos
10:15 – 10:30   One, Two and Three light Demo
10:30 – 10:45   Break
10:45 – 12:00   Live Studio shoot
12:00 – 1:00   Lunch (on your own)
1:00 – 1:30 Critique of studio shoot
1:30 – 2:30 Editing
2:30 – 2:40  Break
2:40 – 4:10 Tower Hill Botanic Garden Shoot
4:10 – 4:20 Break
4:20 – 4:50 Story Behind the image
4:50 – 5:00 Q&A and Surveys
ITINERARY   BOSTON, MA

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: 250.00 Photo Workshop FREE to WAP Members this Weekend
